description:
Hibari infuses the flames of three rings into a single box. Unable to withstand the incredible firepower, the box crumbles, revealing the “Needle Sphere” underneath – It is a void that completely shuts out everything besides the people who are fighting. “I want to end this quickly. My schedule is full,” Hibari says. What is the true meaning of his profound words...? Meanwhile, Tsuna finds himself surrounded by the Deathstalk Squad, led by Iris. They attack with  body clones made with Iris`s cloud flames. Spanner begins to talk about Iris and the creation of the Deathstalk Squad…
Source: crunchyroll
